description: Bullfrog Productions Limited was a British video game developer known for games like Populus, Theme Park and Dungeon Keeper.
name: Bullfrog

description: Westwood Studios are best known for the Command & Conquer series, one of the first and most popular real-time strategy games at the time.
name: Westwood Studios

description: Victory Games is a video game company that was founded in 2010 by David J. Davis, who is also the founder of the company's successor, Victory Studios.
name: Victory Games

description: Maxis Software was known for the game Family Sim City. From this IP, the Sims game series was born.
name: Maxis Software

description: Visceral Games is most known for the Dead Space IP and the Simpsons Game.
name: Visceral Games

description: Medal of Honor, The Lord of the Rings, James Bond and more.
name: DreamWorks Interactive

description: Known for Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2 and Mirrors Edge.
